text: Orthodontopsis bardunovii is a species of moss in the family Orthodontiaceae. It is endemic to Russia, where it is known only from the Altai and Sayan Mountains. It grows on rotting logs in forested habitat and it is threatened by deforestation.Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Orthodontopsis bardunovii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2015.2.
